IncidentDef.label: find out survivor quest
IncidentDef.letterText: There are rumors that beasthuman who were separated from their friends were witnessed near the colony. If go to that place within {0} days, he may still be there. \n {1}

IncidentDef.label: gait of ancient one quest
IncidentDef.letterText: With some clues, we grabbed the steps of the unknown one. "It", which is the master of servant dragons, will probably stay there for {0} days. Unfortunately, there seems to be not much time for contact.
